sentences.english: Scrolling right will reveal the rest of the panoramic image.
sentences.chinese: 将图片右移可以看到全景图的其他部分。

sentences.english: You can also embed the panorama in your own website.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以将全景图嵌入你的站点。

sentences.english: To see a full panoramic vista from there, scroll right.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要观看全景图，请向右滚动。

sentences.english: Build a panoramic understanding of the existing technology environment.
sentences.chinese: 构建对现有技术环境的全景了解。

sentences.english: The panoramic view of the Mangkang County Mangkang County is the interchange of the south and north Sichuan-Tibet lines.
sentences.chinese: 《芒康县全景》芒康县也是川藏南北线进藏的交汇处。

sentences.english: Marfa, West Texas. The panorama is amazing.
Through the window of the hall , we could see the big park of the upper belvedere.
sentences.chinese: 透过厅堂里的窗户，可以看到上宫大公园的全景。

sentences.english: Spin flash eBook in 3D panoramic template with 360 degree effect.
sentences.chinese: 旋转闪蒸电子书3D全景模板具有360度的效果。

sentences.english: Yet the picture may not be entirely bleak.
sentences.chinese: 然而，经济全景或许并非全然暗淡。

sentences.english: National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) released the first-ever view of the whole Sun in 3-D on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 美国宇航局当日首次公布了太阳全景3D图片。

sentences.english: We can have a panoramic view of the entire island.
sentences.chinese: 可以看到湄洲岛的全景。

sentences.english: In a panoramic survey of nature, speed is interest in g because it has a ceil in g.
sentences.chinese: 概观自然全景，速率是有趣的，因为它有一个上限。

sentences.english: A panorama sunroof and bi-xenon headlights will follow at a later time.
sentences.chinese: 全景天窗和双氙大灯将在稍后的时间。

sentences.english: Welcome to participate in the panoram net investor to investigate.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎参加全景网投资者调查。

sentences.english: Panoramic photo is a special type of photography since the early days.
sentences.chinese: 全景照片由早期起，已是摄影中一项独突的种类。

sentences.english: Increase Maximum Picture Size in Burst, Sport & Panorama Mode.
sentences.chinese: 增加最大图片大小在连拍，运动和全景模式。

definition: to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
real scene (not set up or posed)/real location (not a film studio set or theater)/live action (not animation)
to overlook/to look down from a height
bird's-eye view/see also 鳥瞰圖|鸟瞰图[niao3 kan4 tu2]
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
bird's-eye view/see also 俯瞰圖|俯瞰图[fu3 kan4 tu2]
to view/to look at/to look sth over
